name: Purity (ZakKaioken)
description:
Silly dolls like to have fun doing their own things, and tend to lose track of time and also their most precious item; the purification orb. They get stressed out and have to sit in their most comfortable spot to try to forget they lost grip of it...

Controls:

Controls Mouse and Keyboard Gamepad Move Cursor/ CameraMouse Right Stick Select
ThrowLeft Mouse Button or E
Right Mouse Button or  QA
XMoveWASD or Arrow keysLeft Stick


Note from creator: From the creator of OJIWOJI comes a brand new experience, Purity.
